nodes.text: An unidentified female was a member of the Spiderclan, one of the clans on Dathomir that made up the Nightsisters, during the Galactic Civil War. She had dark skin with white tattoos, black eyes, and black hair. She wore brown robes and wielded two swords.

The Spiderclan stalker was pictured on the card "Spiderclan Stalker" from the Nightsister's Revenge expansion set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. The set was released on December 15, 2009. The Spiderclan Stalker was drawn by Ben Wootten.
